QuestData.Title: The Path to the Citadel
QuestData.Description: They've put our captured soldiers to work in the quarry.$B$BKill their captors and set them free, $c. We will need their aid when we confront Scourgelord Tyrannus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 15 Horde Slaves and kill Forgemaster Garfrost.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well this day.$B$BWith many of the slaves freed and now with access to the forges, it will not be long before I have a strong force to aid in delivering us from Scourgelord Tyrannus and this foul pit.
